column6: The Knights of Hykon have Phoenix at their mercy! Professor X and Nightcrawler discover the dark truth behind the eternal warriors, but has the knowledge come too late? As Earth begins to burn, an enraged Cyclops leads the X-Men into a realm of forgotten legends for the final battle! Don't miss the classic "All-New" X-Men in their final conflict with these never before seen foes in... "The Shattered World!" Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciler:Reilly Brown | penciler:Nelson DeCastro | penciler:Scott Koblish | writer:Scott Gray
